objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='grad1' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='80%' fx='50%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#9C27B0;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#6A1B9A;stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><circle cx='150' cy='200' r='50' fill='#4CAF50' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='300' cy='150' r='70' fill='#8BC34A' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='200' cy='350' r='90' fill='#FFEB3B' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='120' cy='500' r='40' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='250' cy='600' r='60' fill='#4CAF50' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='150' cy='720' r='80' fill='#8BC34A' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='300' cy='800' r='70' fill='#FFEB3B' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='180' cy='900' r='45' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='50' cy='850' r='30' fill='#4CAF50' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='400' cy='100' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='450' cy='250' r='35' fill='#4CAF50' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='350' cy='400' r='50' fill='#8BC34A' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='470' cy='550' r='40' fill='#FFEB3B' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='380' cy='700' r='60' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='420' cy='850' r='30' fill='#4CAF50' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='500' cy='950' r='45' fill='#8BC34A' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#F5F5F5'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Biggest, brightest bubbles on earth!
• Eco-friendly, safe & non-toxic
• Hours of fun with 4 liter refill
You'll run out of breath before bubbles!

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This banner design has a lively and fun layout tailored for promoting a bubble solution product. The background features a playful left-half with a violet radial gradient from center to edges, overlaid with colorful translucent bubble-like circles, contrasted with a clean white right-half. The left section includes a bold, large heading (`heading`) and subtitle (`subheading`) near the top, followed by a list of product features (`description`) in bullet points. The price is emphasized in large yellow fonts (`price`), placed above a green call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with a "SHOP NOW" label (`cta`). A tagline (`tagline`) sits below the button. The right half displays a bright green product bottle (`product_image`), drawing immediate attention. The banner communicates clarity, fun, and appeal through its clean structure and vibrant visuals.

**Color Palette:**
- Purple Gradient: `#9C27B0` to `#6A1B9A`
- Yellow: `#FFEB3B`
- Green: `#4CAF50`, `#8BC34A`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Background (right side): `#F5F5F5`
product_color: The product image uses a vibrant, playful color palette that perfectly suits its fun, bubbly theme. Dominant colors include neon green (#A1EF86) from the liquid, which exudes freshness and energy, and purple (#8E44AD) from the cap and label, adding bold contrast. The text "Gazillion" is a mix of yellow-green (#C5F202) and bright green (#6EC72B), outlined with dark blue (#3A1B8D) and orange (#FF8C00), which highlight and separate the letters distinctively. A cheerful yellow (#FFD700) is used for the "BUBBLES" text, providing high visibility. The pastel bubble tones (light lavender #DCCEFF, soft blue #B3DAFF) create a whimsical, effervescent feel that blends all elements harmoniously.
